N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 847.1 - Adopting orders

State Regulations
(a) Pursuant to
the authority contained in article 12 of the Public Health Law, Water Pollution

Control Board, after having made proper studies and having held public hearings
on due notice with reference thereto, hereby adopts and assigns the following
classifications and standards of quality and purity to the various waters as
specifically designated and described below and subject to the definitions and
conditions as hereinafter stated. (b) Pursuant to article 12 of the Public

Health Law, the Water Resources Commission, after proper study and following a
public hearing conducted by the former Water Pollution Control Board, held on
due notice, adopts the following amendments to the classifications and
standards of quality and purity assigned to fresh surface waters of the Lake

Ontario drainage basin to change item number 573 referring to Fourmile Creek, and item number 575 referring to Shipbuilders Creek and certain unnamed
tributaries of Lake Ontario in table I, section
847.5, infra, as hereinafter
defined. This adoption and assignment of standards of quality and purity to the
above designated waters, as amended, shall be effective May 1, 1963. Notes
